script.name: !init.ship.globalscriptmap.pl
script.description: Initialisation for all ships with race player

line.comment: * set default scripts for all ships with race player
* Navigation Commands
* global script map: ignore: key=[COMMAND_MOVE_BEACON], class=[Freight Drone], race=$race
* $cmd = [COMMAND_JUMP_STATION]
* global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[Moveable Ship], race=$race, script='!ship.cmd.jumpstation.std', prio=0
* global script map: ignore: key=$cmd, class=[Drone], race=$race
* $cmd = [COMMAND_JUMP_SECTOR]
* global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[Moveable Ship], race=$race, script='!ship.cmd.jump.std', prio=0
* global script map: ignore: key=$cmd, class=[Drone], race=$race
* $cmd = [COMMAND_JUMP_POSITION]
* global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[Moveable Ship], race=$race, script='!ship.cmd.jumpposition.std', prio=0
* global script map: ignore: key=$cmd, class=[Drone], race=$race
* global script map: ignore: key=[COMMAND_JUMPTOME], class=[Freight Drone], race=$race
* $cmd = [COMMAND_FREIGHT_TRANSFER]
* global script map: ignore: key=$cmd, class=[Drone], race=$race
* Fight Commands
* $cmd = [COMMAND_KILL_ENEMIES_RANGE]
* global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[Moveable Ship], race=$race, script='!ship.cmd.killenemiesrange.pl', prio=0
* global script map: ignore: key=$cmd, class=[Freight Drone], race=$race
*$cmd = [COMMAND_LAUNCH_ALLMARINES]
*global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[Ship], race=$race, script='!ship.cmd.launchmarines.pl', prio=0
*global script map: ignore: key=$cmd, class=[Drone], race=$race
* $cmd = [COMMAND_RETREAT]
* global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[Moveable Ship], race=$race, script='!ship.cmd.retreat.std', prio=0
* global script map: ignore: key=$cmd, class=[Drone], race=$race
* Special Commands
* Signals
* global script map: set: key=[SIGNAL_ATTACKED], class=[TS], race=$race, script='!ship.signal.attacked.ts', prio=100
* global secondary signal map: remove signal=[SIGNAL_ATTACKED] race=$race class=[TS] name='!ship.signal.attacked.ts.player'
* global secondary signal map: add signal=[SIGNAL_ATTACKED] race=$race class=[TS] script='!ship.signal.attacked.ts' prio=100 name='!ship.signal.attacked.ts.player'
* Ignore Jobs

sval.val: Initialisation for all ships with race player
set default scripts for all ships with race player
Navigation Commands
global script map: ignore: key=[COMMAND_MOVE_BEACON], class=[Freight Drone], race=$race
$cmd = [COMMAND_JUMP_STATION]
global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[Moveable Ship], race=$race, script='!ship.cmd.jumpstation.std', prio=0
global script map: ignore: key=$cmd, class=[Drone], race=$race
$cmd = [COMMAND_JUMP_SECTOR]
global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[Moveable Ship], race=$race, script='!ship.cmd.jump.std', prio=0
global script map: ignore: key=$cmd, class=[Drone], race=$race
$cmd = [COMMAND_JUMP_POSITION]
global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[Moveable Ship], race=$race, script='!ship.cmd.jumpposition.std', prio=0
global script map: ignore: key=$cmd, class=[Drone], race=$race
global script map: ignore: key=[COMMAND_JUMPTOME], class=[Freight Drone], race=$race
$cmd = [COMMAND_FREIGHT_TRANSFER]
global script map: ignore: key=$cmd, class=[Drone], race=$race
Fight Commands
$cmd = [COMMAND_KILL_ENEMIES_RANGE]
global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[Moveable Ship], race=$race, script='!ship.cmd.killenemiesrange.pl', prio=0
global script map: ignore: key=$cmd, class=[Freight Drone], race=$race
$cmd = [COMMAND_LAUNCH_ALLMARINES]
global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[Ship], race=$race, script='!ship.cmd.launchmarines.pl', prio=0
global script map: ignore: key=$cmd, class=[Drone], race=$race
$cmd = [COMMAND_RETREAT]
global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=[Moveable Ship], race=$race, script='!ship.cmd.retreat.std', prio=0
global script map: ignore: key=$cmd, class=[Drone], race=$race
Special Commands
global script map: set: key=[SIGNAL_ATTACKED], class=[TS], race=$race, script='!ship.signal.attacked.ts', prio=100
global secondary signal map: remove signal=[SIGNAL_ATTACKED] race=$race class=[TS] name='!ship.signal.attacked.ts.player'
global secondary signal map: add signal=[SIGNAL_ATTACKED] race=$race class=[TS] script='!ship.signal.attacked.ts' prio=100 name='!ship.signal.attacked.ts.player'
Ignore Jobs
